parameters.description: The attribute can be used for restricting UEs from mobility to an NR                                 network of another operator.

parameters.name: FreqPrioNR.connModeMobilityPrio
parameters.description: Priority of NR frequencies is defined in                                     FreqPrioNR MO instance as a child of                                     RATFreqPrio MO.

parameters.name: FreqPrioNR.voicePrio
parameters.description: Priority for handovers with an ongoing VoLTE connection can be                                 defined among NR frequencies with this attribute.

events.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_S1_OUT
events.type: Event parameter                                             EVENT_PARAM_HO_PACKET_FORWARD is                                         added to the PM event.

feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012580 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012580 MO instance.
